sect3.title: Scripts
sect3.para: checkfs, cleanfs, functions, halt, ifdown, ifup, loadkeys, localnet, mountfs, mountproc, network, rc, reboot, sendsignals, setclock, swap, sysklogd and template

sect4.title: checkfs
sect4.para: The checkfs script checks the file systems just before they are mounted (with the exception of journal and network based file systems).

sect4.title: cleanfs
sect4.para: The cleanfs script removes files that shouldn't be preserved between reboots, such as /var/run/*, /var/lock/*, it re-creates /var/run/utmp and removes the possible present /etc/nologin, /fastboot and /forcefsck files.

sect4.title: functions
sect4.para: The functions script contains shared functions among different scripts such as error checking, status checking, etc.

sect4.title: halt
sect4.para: The halt script halts the system.

sect4.title: ifdown, ifup
sect4.para: The ifdown and ifup scripts assist the network script with network devices.

sect4.title: loadkeys
sect4.para: The loadkeys script loads the proper keymap table that matches your keyboard layout.

sect4.title: localnet
sect4.para: The localnet script sets up the system's hostname and local loopback device.

sect4.title: mountfs
sect4.para: The mountfs script mounts all file systems that aren't marked noauto or aren't network based.

sect4.title: mountproc
sect4.para: The mountproc script is used to mount the proc filesystem.

sect4.title: network
sect4.para: The network script sets up network interfaces (such as network cards) and sets up the default gateway where applicable.

sect4.title: rc
sect4.para: The rc script is the master runlevel control script which is responsible for running all the other scripts one-by-one in a specific sequence.

sect4.title: reboot
sect4.para: The reboot scripts reboots the system.

sect4.title: sendsignals
sect4.para: The sendsignals script makes sure every process is terminated before the system reboots or halts.

sect4.title: setclock
sect4.para: The setclock scripts resets the kernel clock to localtime in case the hardware clock isn't set to GMT time.

sect4.title: swap
sect4.para: The swap scripts enables and disables swap files and partitions.

sect4.title: sysklogd
sect4.para: The sysklogd script start and stops the system and kernel log daemons.

sect4.title: template
sect4.para: The template script is a template you can use to create your own bootscripts for your other daemons.
